subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The brothers Sergei and Andrei Kostitsyn scored 1 minute 28 seconds apart in the opening minutes of their playoff debuts Thursday night, and the Montreal Canadiens defeated the visiting Boston Bruins, 4-1, in Game 1 of their first-round playoff series.
